exceptions.exn: The LHS of (pow_n_plus x n m) (pow_n x (n + m)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of (pow_n_plus x m n) (pow_n x (m + n)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of mult_assoc (mult _ (mult _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring x : K n, m : nat Unable to unify "mult (pow_n x m) (pow_n x n)" with "mult (pow_n x n) (pow_n x m)".

original: intros K x n m. rewrite (pow_n_plus x n m). rewrite (pow_n_plus x m n). rewrite (mult_assoc). reflexivity.
